review_body: I received this today, the day my son decided he wanted to make a mocha freeze.  Perfect timing!  I have a heavy-duty blender that I love, but it is big, and I cannot leave it on my counter.  It's a bit of a nuisance to pull it out of the cabinet when I'm making a smoothie for just me.  This personal-sized blender is perfect for an individual drink (or two smaller drinks, using the larger mixing cup!).  I quickly made an orange drink slushy with about a cup of ice and a cup of water.  The ice was completely pulverized in just about ten seconds.  When my son made his mocha freeze, he ran it for about 20 seconds, and pulsed it a couple of times.  Both drinks were SUPER smooth!  I was very impressed with the blender's ability to blend the ice so finely!  The instructions say the unit may turn off if you let it run too long (maybe four minutes?), I don't know why it would take that long to blend anything, though!Before I used it, I quickly washed it with hot water and soap.  I was very pleasantly surprised that it cleaned up so very well after use, as well.  No greasy residue from the dairy in the mocha drink.  The plastic is perfectly clear, so you can always see what's going on in the cup while it is blending.To top it off, each of the blending cups come with a flip travel lid.  These DO NOT LEAK!!!  I've seen other brands of personal blenders that cost MUCH more...I'm glad I bought this one instead of one of those!  Why pay more if you don't have to?

The blender works pretty good. The only thing is when I used some frozen strawberries and blueberries I had to blend twice to get it to not have any chunks. That is not bad for a compact blender like this. Also, I had to hit my cup a a few times and shake a little to make sure the contents were being blended properly. The blade seemed to nof blend it much so had to blend a 2nd time for under a minute like instructions state. Overall, not a bad blender. I like that it comes with 2 cups! The blender has 3 levels of blending is cool also. Not a bad purchase. Looking forward to take this when I travel. It is very like looking...the dark red.

I have a very small kitchen so when I look for kitchen appliances I look for the smallest and best ones for what I need. And this one fit just what I was looking for. The blender itself is a small size and doesn't have any extra cups you put on it along with having to pour it in another cup to drink out of. Huge plus because less space and even better less dishes! You just take it off, flip it right side up, unscrew it and put on the lid to drink out of and walk out the door. I used it to make milkshakes with fruit and I couldn't even get a picture of it in progress because I had 2 little kids excited and couldn't even take a picture after they were done because they drank it up within minutes. I love how there is a protector on the plug too helps keep it safe from water or anything else that night bend it. The different speeds are great to use it to get the consistency you want for what you are blending. I highly recommend this blendee!

This is a fantastic blender. I could not be happier with this product. The blender was packaged very well and came with a large and small bottle and an extra gasket. A couple of summers ago, I made smoothies daily using a commercial grade blender. It is big and bulky and I no longer wanted it on my counter.  Yesterday, I took this blender out of the box, washed the components and proceeded to prepare a smoothie. This blender is fast. It is powerful. It crushes ice cubes easily! I used greens, fruit, greek yogurt, water and six ice cubes. I had a perfectly blended smoothie in less than one minute. I cleaned up the bottle and made a second one for my husband right away.Everything cleans up easily. The size is perfect and I can pop this in and out of a drawer readily. I cannot recommend this enough.  Comes with a two year warranty that can be extended with product registration. If you like smoothies, give this blender a try.

Your browser does not support HTML5 video.


  ¬†Great little smoothie blender.  Perfect for one or two servings at a time.  Blends like the more expensive models.  Easy to clean and compact storage.  Highly recommended.

I like to make protein shake or just a smoothie.  But I admit I'm too lazy to get out my big blender each time then clean it afterwards.  I LOVE this blender! So convenient to use.  Just put everything in the stirring cup, blend,  then drink right from the stirring cup on the go. It's so nice that it's dishwasher safe,  too. This seriously saves so much of my time.

HadinEEon blender GS-651. Comes with two bottles: 10 oz / 300 ml, and 20 oz / 600 ml.The blender mixesthe smoothies well and quickly. Two speeds and  pulse options.3 year manufacturer warranty with product registration.

This small machine can take the place of a much larger blender. It easily fits on the counter and looks much more expensive than it is with the matte red color. It‚Äôs easy to clean and has the same type of blade at the bottom, just like my huge, name brand blender, but I‚Äôll actually use this! The time to assemble and clean the box blender made us not use it. This one will get daily use.

review_title: Small package with lots to offer.
review_body: Compact: This small blender really packs a punch. It effortlessly blends frozen fruit for my smoothie. It did so at all speeds. Since it's compact, it stores very easily, though the matte burgundy body is attractive enough to leave out on the counter.Convenient: The handles on the bottle lids come in handy for portability. I make breakfast smoothies for the family early in the morning, and store the portable bottles in the fridge. They take up very little room.My only wish is that it came with more than two bottles. I'd love to be able to buy extra/replacement bottles. Hope that's will be available soon!

Your browser does not support HTML5 video.


  ¬†This is very convenient and easy to use juicer.I got this juicer so I can make fresh fruit juice in the morning. Work perfectly.I like the color, and I like how it looks in the kitchen.It kind of keeps reminding me to make a fresh juice every morning.I'm posted some videos so you can see how it works.

review_title: Great product if you make smoothies daily.
review_body: I purchased this blender for my daughter. I have a Nutri Ninja, and this is a rival. If I did not already have my blender, I would be buying this for myself as well. She was very happy with this one. One thing that used to keep me from making more protein smoothies is the fact that we had a full-sized blender and I hated having to wash it after each use. I do not always have enough dishes to run the dishwasher daily, so I would end up hand washing the glass container & it was a pain. This morning, I added crushed ice, water, chocolate protein powder, a banana, & almond butter and pressed the button. Within seconds, it was all blended perfectly and ready to drink. They do not leak at all. I'm impressed that the rubber grommets are easy to remove to easily clean. And it came with spare grommets too! After it was finished, I removed the cup from the base and drank my drink. I am really surprised at how powerful it is for being small. Great product if you make smoothies daily.

Got this because we have enjoyed the HadinEEon milk frother so much, so thought, why not? So glad I did, because it has met my expectations so far! Decided to go big from the beginning -- frozen bananas, blueberries, Greek yogurt & oatmilk -- for a thick, creamy and healthy dessert. The compact blender is cute (and perfectly sized for a single serving, or bigger for two), super easy to use, and surprisingly quick and quiet. I foresee expanding my breakfast options with some delicious smoothies1

This is my third blender. The first two gave up, and I wanted to try out something nice. I trust the brand, as I already have purchased a couple of other items. This blender looks so good on my countertop, and the dualtone color is just perfect. I am very pleased with how powerful it is. I can make smoothies that are truly pulverized. It comes with 2 jars, both for adult size and kids size.I am used to using a large sized blender container, so I like that, but I also really like that I can make a smoothie for one - and drink it out of the container! I also like how easy this is to clean.I‚Äôm very pleased with this machine and would highly recommended it.

Thrilled with this device!  Quick clean up and easy assemble.  Looks great alongside my Water Kettle.  Blends frozen strawberries within seconds and uniformly mixes for great smoothie texture.  Recipe for pictured drink: 1 part frozen strawberries, 2 parts almond milk, 1 drop vanilla, 1 tsp date syrup.  Delicious!

I made bulletproof in 10 seconds. Very quick and so easy, put my ingredients in, coffee, cacao powder and heavy cream, seconds later, it's done.  The to-go cup is so convenient, blend, put the lid on and go. Quality is also great, with the heavy plastic bottle.I am very pleased with this purchase. You will be, too

It blended avocado, orange with soymilk in few seconds on speed 1. It is light weight, easy to put together and use. This is the first time I have a personal blender. My old blender is just too big for blending small drinks. I wish they have more colors rather than just the dark red.

This product is great for on the go. With two different size bottles, I can choose how big or small I want my smoothie that day. Also biggest ‚Äúit‚Äù factor is that the blender is also your cup, for easy cleanup.would recommend!

First glance after I removed all of the items out of the box was that I noticed that this kit includes a small AND large cup size. This is comforting to know when deciding how much I can blend at one time. I also love the burgundy color which looks better than what I had expected (thought this item was red).The blender itself is user friendly. I had no real issues with set up and blending all of the items together. Also adore the dial feature - you can chose either 1 (low) or 2 (high) for power.I blended a banana smoothie (1 cup ice, 2 tblspn sugar, 1/2 banana and 1 cup milk). As you can see in the attached pics, this compact blender did the job. The only hiccup I had was that I needed to shake the bottle half way through because the bottom of the cup (before turning bottle upside down to blend) froze quickly so this part did not blend until I shook the bottle half way (temp shut off power 1st) through the blending. Otherwise, a very nice blender.

This little blender does a great job of making smoothies and small tasks like that. Comes with two size containers and an extra seal. I'm no blender expert but it seems powerful enough for frozen berries and ice so far. Pics are pre-use obviously.

review_title: Works great, it comes with two bottles!
review_body: Works great, bottles are good quality and come in two sizes, very convenient!
I really like the color of this blender and that it comes with two different size cups. Makes good smoothies.

Love this product! I like the 2 different speeds for options and especially love the to go cups that are the same container it is blended in so now transferring cups if you are taking it to go and has special lids as well! Works great for smoothies and milkshakes!

review_title: Great and easy to use blender
review_body: It was an excellent compact blender, very versatile and easy to use. I especially like the 2 different size blender cup and the pulse function.

Don't be deceived by how small this blender is, it is really powerful. I have one of the big brand name blenders and this gives it some competition. I like the size, the quaintness of it and the two on the go bottles it comes with. I already made a smoothie with some kale,  almond milk, half a banana and some blueberries and it did its thing. Clean up is a breeze and doesn't take a lot to wash the motor cover and bottle, much easier to clean than the brand name. My 14 year old made her own smoothie which she's never done with the other one. I discovered this company right before Christmas and am impressed with my purchases. The price for this blender is definitely worth it. No regrets!

review_title: Cute, Compact and Easy to Use
review_body: This blender is perfect for a college apartment! The blades are sharp and strong enough to make smoothies and it is incredibly easy to set up and use. The color looks great in any kitchen and the size  is just another plus. For the price, I would say that this blender is worth every penny!

I have been trying to decide an a smoothie maker and came across this one. I like the two container sizes it comes with and I really like the color. It's pretty!! The containers are nice and clear and have measurements on the sides.I used it right after I took the pictures and it is so easy to use. So so easy to clean and doesn't take up a lot of space for storage. I named it Red....Red it really strong and in no time I had a great smoothie. So if you are looking for really great smoothie maker you should get one.

Your browser does not support HTML5 video.


  ¬†This blender is easy to clean and very powerful! The blender comes with 3 speeds that you can use for different ingredients or make the texture of the smoothies to your liking. I love that the bottle size is big enough for the blender yet convenient when you can just take it with you. It comes with a replacement seal ring in the package which is very thoughtful. In the user manual, there are several smoothies recipes you can use right away! I tried the berry and tropical smoothies recipes which I definitely recommend :D

This blender is an inexpensive compact catch for the consumer.  I did 3/4 C frozen blueberries, 1/4 frozen banana, 3/4 C almond milk, 3 T of oats, 1 T of hemp, and kale.  The liquid, was trapped in the frozen blueberries at the top.  So I had to loosen the milk by stirring with a spoon.  Then I used P mode to grind the big chunks and then switched to the high.  I had to shake and repeat twice.  You wouldn‚Äôt have to do that with fresh fruit, I‚Äôm sure. The only other thing that happened is the blade became stuck in the bottom, not sure if that‚Äôs user fault, however, I had to screw an empty bottle on and press down to loosen the blade.  It comes with 1 large bottle and one small. Overall, this is a great item for the cost.  HadinEEon keep making these great gadgets!

As soon as this smoothie machine arrived on my doorstep, my seven year old son took it out of the box, assembled it, and had all of the ingredients on the counter to make our first smoothies. I'm always hesitant to trust that a smoothie machine will blend all of the ingredients into a nice texture and blend with no troubles. I was very excited to see that this smoothie machine went right to work and just a minute later, I had already made the first two smoothies for my kids. It's easy to clean, the bottles are portable because they come with lids, and the dials are easy to understand. Definitely recommend!

review_title: Good looking and effective personal blender
review_body: Initial reaction is very positive. Second item I got from this brand and both are attractive sitting on the counter, feel as if they are well made and easy to operate. was surprised how easily this small unit made my go to shake - ice, frozen fruit, protein powder and peanut butter made it quick - no jamming... One suggestion - flip the fill lines so they are useful when filling not during operation

Just received this and have been trying it out. It‚Äôs a good countertop blender, well made with good quality materials and several very useful features, and really nice looking (I love the brushed steel red finish on the body). It comes with two bottles that you fill with things to be blended, cover with the blades top, and screw onto the base machine to turn on. I‚Äôve made fruit/yogurt/spinach smoothies easily. A couple of berries were left intact, but I only turned it on to the first level of power (there are three). It is important to include some liquid to get a smooth blend. The BPA-free (says this on the bottom) plastic bottles have lids for portability. I will use it a lot.

Compact footprint. Attractive out on counter if you like. Blends well... I even include carrots in my daily smoothies. The travel/blending containers work well with no leakage so far even when it gets tossed all around in my bag to work. Only problem so far is I left out the spare "O" ring that comes with it and my cat ran off with it somewhere!

review_title: Good little machine for a college student or single person
review_body: For a 300 watt blender, this is a great little machine.  It arrived yesterday and we had to try it out immediately.  It definitely worked well.  I don‚Äôt know how it would do with ice but it was great for a smoothies and my daughter is excited to have a personal blender she can take to college.  Easy to clean up and really like the size.  I also like that this is BPA free and came with a separate bottle you can use to put the smoothie in to go.  Good value.

This small compact an powerful single size blender is great.  My wife who is not a big fruit eater now makes a few smooths a day.  It is easy to load and very easy to clean.  Rather than having to get your large blender down from q shelf you can use this handheld product

review_title: Love my Smoothie Blender. Great for single serving smoothies, dressings, etc.
review_body: Loving my smoothie blender! It works great for single portion smoothies - excellent for portion control! Also excellent for making salsas, dressings, cold foam, etc. I have a large glass blender which is just too much to bring out sometimes so this is the perfect solution when I need something quick and easy!

This is a fantastic blender. The blender was packaged very well and I love that it comes with a large and small bottle and an extra gasket. It's a great blender and doesn't take up a whole lot of counter space. It's very powerful and blends up all the veggies very quickly and super easy to clean. It blends all the fruits and veggies up very smoothly in just minutes. It doesn't take a lot of time compared to what I have been using traditionally. I absolutely love this blender and would definitely recommend it.

Great little blender. Before making anything to drink, I just blended some ice and water. It did an amazing job blending the ice, basically making it shaved ice.  After testing it out, I used it to make frozen blueberry smoothies. They turned out great!  Smooth and plenty thick. My kids loved them. There was a slight smell coming from the unit when I used it, but it has not given me any problems. It‚Äôs very easy to clean out.

Every day I try to make a healthy fruit smoothie. I already had a Ninja Auto IQ blender; it's very powerful but very loud. I wanted something a bit smaller and more quiet. After looking around I found this product and so far I'm very satisfied. I've been using it every day and it's worked great so far.It's so much more quiet and I plan to take it with me when travelling gets better so I can keep making healthy drinks. Highly recommended.

review_title: This is the smoothie blender you‚Äôre looking for!
review_body: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews but I felt like I needed to write this one. First omg this blender is beautiful. This is the third smoothie blender (final) I‚Äôm buying off Amazon and let me tell you this one is perfect. Noise level- almost zero compared to the ones I have bought in the past. It was so low I thought it wasn‚Äôt working Lol but obviously, it was. As you can see from my pictures my smoothies came out perfectly whipped, I couldn‚Äôt believe I had ice in it. Perfect it is. Save yourself the trouble of going through Amazon (trust I have looked and tried), this is the smoothie blender you‚Äôre looking for.

Looks sleek and cup size is good but shape of the cup traps frozen fruit at the top. You have to bang the cup and take it off the motor to shake it. My blade attachment actually got stuck in the motor so I returned it. Before I had a malfunction with my machine I wrote a 4 star review because I was told if I wrote a review at all I would get a $15 gift card so I was honest. I was just emailed and told that if I changed my review to 5 stars I would get an additional $5 as a 4 star ‚Äúlooks bad for business‚Äù. Don‚Äôt be fooled by all the 5 star reviews it‚Äôs just a cheap blender.

review_title: Great blender with easy clean up!
review_body:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.


  ¬†This blender is amazing! I use to blend my ice, almond milk, protein powder, and activate c to make my Orange Creamsicle Shake. Blends well, quickly, and a very easy clean up!!!!

review_title: This is the blender you want!
review_body: We almost chose a competitors ‚Äúpersonal‚Äù blender. After review we could see the competitors blender was far too small. This blender is an excellent quality. It performs better than expected. And having 2 different size cups you make your drink right in helps busy people with less steps.  The lids for travel make this blender so versatile. Highly recommend.

The design of the unit is appealing.  The blending power does the job well as there were no chunks of food in the mix.  The bottles are easy to rinse as well as the blade.Great that I can keep on my counter for quick use.

I was looking for a small personal blender, as I like to make smoothies after work outs. I came across the HadinEEon smoothie blender, and saw that it was highly reviewed, so I thought I'd give it a try. After making a few smoothies, I am thoroughly impressed with this blender. It hardly takes up any counter space, comes with two different size smoothie containers, and for how powerful it is, it is quiet. If you are looking for a quality single serving blender, this is it!

review_title: Pretty, High Quality, Easy to clean
review_body: I very much like this smoothie blender! High quality. And it doesn‚Äôt take too much space in my kitchen. I love that it has 2 size portable bottles, very easy to clean and BPA FREE. I‚Äôve been using it every day since I got it. Crushes ice, nuts, veggies and fruits. Totally recommend.

I love this blender so far as soon as I got it I started using it ! It‚Äôs small just right size in my opinion not to big comes with two bottles that you can switch out. Quick, Easy 1-2-3 which I love! I also love the color and it doesn‚Äôt take up much counter space the blending power it excellent .You also get a 3 year warranty once you register it on there website which is great ! Great purchase ! Also in the manual it gives you different drinks to make which I‚Äôm excited to try out ! Thank you HadinEEon !
This blender is great!  Easy to use, easy to clean and so very convenient.  Comes with two BPA-free containers 20oz & 10oz with lids that you drink your shake from.  Just blend, cover and drink.

I was so excited to try this personal sized blender! I was worried it would be loud and wouldn't blend great. Oh boy was I wrong! This blender is surprisingly quiet and blends super fast! I love how convenient this is and how the cup you blend it in, turns into a to-go drink with a lid!  This has saved me so much money because now I make my smoothies at home.. Great purchase!

Blends well, great to have 2 different size personal blending cups. Looks great on counter top, nice color and compact.  Mix and go, the lids make it quick and easy to store or transport. Great little blender.  Good to travel with too.

I bought this as a gift for my wife.  After being very impressed by a coffee grinder I bought a few weeks ago made by the same company I thought I would give this smoothie maker a try.  It works great, cleaned up easy, and comes with two individual bottles.  Excellent purchase.

I Have to say I love this blender! It is so easy to use and easy to clean. The best part is the ready to use containers with very little cleanup. So easy... just remove the blades and add the lid and Wallah its that easy!!! Your ready to go! Also the power is great! No problem bending ice or frozen fruit. I also bended some fresh spinach, eggs and other vege"s and it blended so easily! I just love the red sheerness too. It goes well with my kitchen.

Got this for smoothies and cocktails and this fits the bill. It is small, easy to clean and doesn't take up much space in my cabinet. The nice part is it has two size cups for smaller drinks on the go. I was also pleasantly surprised how sturdy the base was.  It whips up a smoothie with ease. I'm very happy with my new purchase!

Really like this blender. The kids make smoothies everyday. We usually use the nutribullet. This one is much quieter. Love that the cups come with lids and are slim enough to fit in a cup holder. Very happy with the purchase.

Your browser does not support HTML5 video.


  ¬†This little machine is cute powerful , its just what I wanted. It even came with an extra rubber washer. Thank you!! Love it!!

This blender works really well for making smoothies. I have used it for a few times with frozen fruits since getting it and it blends everything up evenly. I like how it comes with two different size cup and they have a cap for it so I can bring it on the go with me. I like how it just comes with enough things that you need so it‚Äôs easy to store and doesn‚Äôt take up a lot of space.

I was looking for a small, easy to use blender to make fruit smoothies. This one does the trick. Not super powerful, but capable enough to make single-serving smoothies. My first blend didn't go so well, but after adding a bit more liquid it did exactly what it should do. Frozen fruit, coconut milk and bananas blend up nicely. I like having control over the sugar content.
Amazing blender. Does exactly what I needed. Breaks up ice smoothly and pulverized with fruit with plenty of power. Not too loud either.

review_title: Compact - Convenient - Change the cap and take your smoothie to go!
review_body: My wife wanted a compact, simple smoothie blender where she can blend her healthy green breakfast ingredients fast, and just change the cap and rush out with a sturdy, sports water bottle to start her day. She likes the quality of the components because her old blender felt flimsy, and this new one feels sturdy and light weight. It doesn't take up a lot of space and it works fast, so she's very happy with it.

I always had my doubts about budget friendly blenders since they usually come with their fair share of troubles. However, with this blender, I got more than I expected!. It works great for smoothies and comes with 2 different sized bottles depending on the amount you want to blend. I used frozen strawberries and blueberries with ice with no trouble. Would purchase any of their products seeing as how this one turned out to be.

I love this blender. Comes with 2 different size jars. Works so smooth. I used it to make banana, chocolate and oats milkshake and everything were blended perfectly. I think this is one of the best products I have purchased in a while. The color is also so great. Shiny Maroon. You want to put this blender at the center of the kitchen where the eyes go immediately. LOL, I am not kidding. I love it, and highly recommend this product.

I love this blender. Great little space saving blender for the price and efficiency. Bought another one almost like it but had to hold down button to keep it going. This one has speed levels as off/on and also a pulse if you just need it for a few seconds.  The sheer tumblers are ready to grab and go!

review_title: Attractive and Easy to Clean Red Blender!
review_body: Overall, I really like this blender! It‚Äôs a perfect size for a personal smoothie and the red color makes it unique. I‚Äôve noticed that when I try to blend frozen fruit or ice, I need to cut it up in small pieces or add gradually to get it to fully blend which is the only reason I did not give it the full stars. I don‚Äôt regret my purchase though and I use it almost daily with no issues!
10s Fast Blending, 3 Adjustable Speeds, Easy to Operate with Rotary Switch, 20oz & 10oz BPA Free Bottles4 Sharp Stainless Steel Blades, Portable for Outdoors with Travel Lid.It has it all.

I ordered this smoothie blender and love it.  I is well made and the motor is very strong.  It has 2 containers so i can make a smoothie and take it to go.  I blended fruit and nuts and it worked great.  It is super easy to clean as well.  I highly recommend this blender.

This tiny blender is fast, has a fairly quiet motor, and is a perfect fit for small kitchens or for taking with you on trips. i also really appreciate the extra rubber gasket! the travel lids seal to the cups (which might i add, had absolutely NO smell out of the box!) quite well. no complaints form me on this one!

review_title: This is a blender and works great.
review_body: I received this blender and was excited to see I could blend my ingredients and take with me on the go. No need to dirty another glass. This made for cleanup so quick and easy. Love this!

This is a nice size blender for making drinks. We also have a Nutri Ninja that is much bigger and has more features. But this blender fits on the counter better and is simple to use. The drink cups seem sturdy enough and everything disassembles easy for cleaning. Easy to use switch has three speeds; pulse, slow and fast.

I use this blender everyday for my after workout smoothies and I have to say is that it‚Äôs wonderful. At first I was a bit worried about it performance because the blades were not sharp at all, but surprisingly it blended up all my frozen fruit perfectly!
Will be replacing all my blenders .. easy to use, easy to wash.. size is perfect for storage!! You must have it! üôå

Never thought of a smoothy blender - this one is very convenient with two sizes of travel cups.  Powerful and easy to use.  I love it. And it just gets better the more I use it. Really helping me lose weight and deliciously satisfying.

review_title: Pr√°ctica de usar y adecuados tama√±os de los vasos para un buen batido
review_body:
Your browser does not support HTML5 video.


  ¬†No es ruidosa y las porciones son adecuadas y el tama√±o de los termos es adecuado y sencillo para cargarlos. Estoy a gusto con ella, la seguir√© usando.  La mezcla contiene, uvas, moras y fresas congeladas con chia y avena por lo que prepar√© la bebida en dos licuadas par no sobrecargar el motor.

review_title: Great product for making individual drinks quickly!
review_body: I no longer wanted a large blender on my counter but needed a small compact size to do individual smoothies.  It really meets my needs - small, able to blend ice and frozen fruit, and easy to clean.  Sometimes I need to do an extra minute of spin to blend but worth this little extra time to have the other conveniences.
Good blender but the blade kept getting stuck inside of the bottom part and I‚Äôve been unable to get it out this time.
This is great for smoothies! Easy clean up and love the different size cups that allow you to blend right in them! What a great product for a great price! Couldn‚Äôt be happier!!!
I was the perfect size, not taking to much space. Is it blends very powerful and I love that it comes with a large cup and a small cup. This is a Kitchen must have. Clean afterwards is a breeze.

I've used it every morning since it arrived and it works great. Mix of fresh and frozen fruit and it comes out smooth every time. Base is a nice size, doesn't take a ton of counter space. Having 2 different sized cups is handy as well. Great product, would recommend!
Works GREAT.  This is a must for Smoothies in your kitchen.

review_title: Great blender for smoothies and milkshakes!
review_body: Great blender for smoothies and milkshakes especially when short on time It has more than enough power for blending any type of fruit, vegetable, or ice. It is easy to clean and having multiple to go containers is a great feature. The instruction manual also contains a few smoothie recipes.

review_title: Great product and I love the colour
review_body: Love it, it‚Äôs doing exactly what I wanted it to do.  It‚Äôs sleek and doesn‚Äôt take up much room
Love trying new smoothie recipes with this blender. So much easier to clean and measure than my vitamix

review_title: Versatile and Easy to Use and Clean
review_body: Excellent product with durable portable bottles with strong lids for travel.  Blends well and has multiple settings.  Easy to clean and easy to store. Very versatile and easy to use for a variety of different recipes.  Overall a great product!

I love this little blender. It arrived today and I made a fruit smoothie. Yum. It blended perfect and clean up was a breeze. I can wait to try a variety of drinks and yummy milkshakes with this little marvel . Love the look, especially the red color.

review_title: The perfect mix between stylish, simple to use, and practical
review_body: Insane amount of value for the price. I needed a blender for my protein shakes in the morning and this is exactly what I been looking for. Red color looks pretty slick in my kitchen, and the blender crushes ice with ease. Also extremely practical when you can just change the lid and go on your way. Recommend it!
Was just as expected, looks nice and modern. The jars are thin plastic so I worry they will wear fast.
Very fast and easy!! I‚Äôm amazed that such a little blende could be so powerful. The set up was super easy and it blends perfectly.....I would totally buy it again and the price was great!
This blender is small but strong like a large one. Highly recommended!
It is a great buy. I truly enjoy using it. Recommend this product
I like that it's not too noisy, blends great and doesn't move when blending. Easy to clean.

This little gem is more powerful than it‚Äôs counterpart the Nutribullet and has 5 blades be the Nutribullets 1 blade, which makes it more efficient in my opinion. It mixes the shakes I use with my meal plan with ice flawlessly. Definitely recommend!
Perfect blender! Compact, fast, not loud! Easy to clean. Extra bonus it looks stylish on my kitchen ! My hubby and I love it üëå
I‚Äôve been using the HadinEon blender in the morning‚Äôs to make fruit smoothies. It‚Äôs a Nice compact machine & comes with 2 L/S  to go bottles. So far so good, I‚Äôd recommend this blender. A+

This blender is a great, small compact alternative to a traditional blender. I actually use this to blend rice, barley, chicken, and vegetables together for my dog. Much easier to clean and get the food out compared to a regular blender!

review_title: Love this color and how it works!
review_body: It is definitely worth it!!!First the silvery red color is awesome.And 8 just blended 15second of frozen banana, strawberry and milk and ta-da!Look what I got !It is powerful, fancy and the price it is great deal.
This is a great compact blender for people on the go. It's powerful, easy to use and clean plus it has a great warranty. Highly recommend!

review_title: Perfect size. Not too big and not to small. Love the travel cups.
review_body: I had a bullet before but like this better because the cups or great to run out the door with. Light, BPA free and the whole set is very pretty on my counter. Works great!!!
This blender is awesome. Bought it for my protein shakes in the morning. Blends crazy quick and smooth! The two size bottles are perfect too. Quick and easy. Great product!
I use the blender in my AirBnb and my guest love it.  It's so nice to have such a handy and unique offering...Next is one for me...

review_title: powerful motor, 3 speeds, easy to clean.
review_body: A sufficiently powerful motor makes the device efficient. It has 3 speeds so you can adapt. It is very easy to clean.
I always make smoothies and this is the best blender I purchased so far. Would highly recommend this product.

Great smoothie blender. Perfect for one or two servings at a time. Blends like the more expensive models. Blender has three levels of blending which is really coolEasy to clean and compact storage. Highly recommended.
